class.name: BehaviorTreeView
class.brief_description: Visualizes the current state of a [BehaviorTree] instance.
class.description: Visualizes the current state of a [BehaviorTree] instance. See also [BehaviorTreeData].

method.name: update_tree
method.description: Updates the representation of a [BehaviorTree] instance. See also [BehaviorTreeData].

members.member: Minimum delay between two updates (in milliseconds). Set to higher values for a lower CPU load.
